document_data.mainbody:
Nyntynel was one of the noble houses of Anauria, one of the Lost Kingdoms of north Faer√ªn. It was known for the skilled wizards that plied their craft for the good of Anaurias people.
In Anauril, wizards of House Nyntynel were known to utilize their spellcraft to enchant weapons and blades that were produced by the citys great weaponsmiths.
It was one of two elven houses that made up Anaurias nobility, along with House Olyrnn.
Circa the Era of Upheaval, some traces of House Nyntynel could be found throughout the ruins of Anauria that were left within the sands of Anauroch.
